list.title: Mouse
list.detail: A computer mouse (plural mice, sometimes mouses) is a hand-held pointing device that detects two-dimensional motion relative to a surface.

list.title: Monitor
list.detail: A computer monitor is an output device that displays information in pictorial or textual form.

list.title: Keyboard
list.detail: A computer keyboard is a peripheral input device modeled after the typewriter keyboardwhich uses an arrangement of buttons.
